attributes.action: attorney generals office court case against npower
attributes.additional_details: NPOWER FILED 2 FALSE COURT STATEMENTS WITH STATEMENT OF TRUTH , THEN FILED A FALSE APPLICATION , THE COURT REFUSED TO VIEW EVIDENCE , THE ATTORNEY GENERALS OFFICE REFUSE TO LOOK INTO A MAJOR COMPANY AND LOOK INTO FALSE APPLICATIONS MADE MY NPOWERS SOLICITORS , THIS ENERGY COMPANY MUST NOT BE ABLE TO BREAK THE LAW GET AWAY WITH CONTEMPT OF COURT , STATEMENTS OF TRUTH ARE ARE LEGAL AND FALSE STATEMENT SHOULD BE VIEWED THAT WAY

rejection.details: Issues regarding Contempt of Court cannot be dealt with via the E-Petitions website.
